summary: The life and times of the rock band Queen - told in two parts covering in part one the 1970's and in part two the 1980's and beyond.
cast: Brian May|Roger Taylor|Chris Smith|Freddie Mercury|Rosie Horide|Tony Stewart|John Deacon|Roy Thomas Baker|Paul Watts|John Reid|Peter Hince|Paul Gambaccini|Harvey Kubernik|Reinhold Mack|Jim Beach|David Richards|Fred Mandel|Midge Ure|Mary Austin|David Bowie|Roger Daltrey|Bryant Gumbel|Elton John|Ian 'Molly' Meldrum|George Michael|Liza Minnelli|Sex Pistols|Robert Plant|Paul Prenter|Queen|Axl Rose|Smile|Tim Staffell|Status Quo
title: Queen: Days of Our Lives
